name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in sunny weather.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

abilities.name: Overgrow

name: Venusaur
description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander

abilities.name: Blaze

abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases every turn.

name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

abilities.name: Torrent

name: Wartortle

abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

name: Blastoise

abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: Rain Dish

name: Caterpie
description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Metapod
description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: The Pokémon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.

name: Weedle
description: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

abilities.name: Shield Dust

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Beedrill
description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

name: Pidgeotto
description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

name: Pidgeot
description: This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet

name: Rattata
description: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

name: Raticate
description: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

abilities.name: Guts

name: Spearow

abilities.name: Keen Eye

name: Fearow

abilities.name: Keen Eye

name: Ekans
description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

name: Arbok
description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the opposing Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Shed Skin

name: Pikachu
description: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

name: Raichu
description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

name: Sandshrew
description: Sandshrew's body is configured to absorb water withoutsound. It is a common sight in deserts.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

name: Sandslash
description: Sandslash's body is covered by tough spikes, which are hardened sections of its hide. It can roll into a ball to attack or escape.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Nidoran♀ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of the same gender.

name: Nidorina
description: When Nidorina are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This Pokémon appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of the same gender.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Nidoqueen's body is encased in extremely hard scales. It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of the same gender.

name: Nidoran♂
description: Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanks to them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of the same gender.

name: Nidorino
description: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of the same gender.

name: Nidoking
description: Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this Pokémon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokeomon may poison the attacker.

name: Clefairy
description: It is said to be able change the weather by changing its fleece color.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokeomon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: The Pokeomon only takes damage from attacks.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

name: Vulpix
description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

abilities.name: Flash Fire

name: Ninetales
description: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

abilities.name: Flash Fire

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff's song puts anyone who hears it to sleep. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

name: Wigglytuff

abilities.name: Competitive

name: Zubat

name: Golbat

abilities.name: Inner Focus

abilities.name: Infiltrator

name: Oddish

name: Gloom
description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: Vileplume
description: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: Paras
description: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

name: Parasect

abilities.name: Effect Spore

abilities.name: Dry Skin

name: Venonat
description: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

name: Diglett
description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
